sql.name: accidentacceptpage
sql.item: select distinct(l.c802800004) from {100} l where l.c802800004 is not null

sql.name: accidentacceptpage.group
sql.item: select sysgroup.C630000018 as groupname,sysgroup.C1 as groupid from {100} sysgroup where sysgroup.C630000021=2 and sysgroup.C630000020<>0 order by sysgroup.c1
